column4: DO NOT RUN THIS Question. is rm -rf / stopped by non-super cow power user? xP
its stopped by the unavailabilty of some libraries, usually... after half of your hdd's files are gone ;)
oh and if you dont use sudo I guess it doesn't delete most things
I mean, a regular user does pretty much not have the right to write to / remove any files other than his home directory and some temporary / shared directories
